location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1663/695 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bombay, to Captain Charles Grant, HBM's Acting First Assistant Resident Persian Gulf, in charge of local duties, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that Grant send the correspondence regarding the Slave Trade to Lieutenent-Colonel Edward Charles Ross, Political Agent at Muscat.
